title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly
descriptions:
Product Name: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping

Introducing the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows, your perfect sleeping companions designed for ultimate comfort and support. This set includes 2 pillows, each filled with plush hollow fiber encased in a soft and breathable Down Alternative Microfiber material. The pillows are suitable for all types of sleepers - back, stomach, and side sleepers alike.

These pillows are engineered with comfort and practicality in mind. The plush hollow fiber filling provides a luxurious feel, while the no-shift construction ensures that the pillows maintain their shape throughout the night, providing consistent support for your head and neck.

The pillows are encased in a skin-friendly, breathable Polyester blend cover that promotes airflow, keeping you cool and comfortable all night long. The cover is also machine washable and can be tumble dried on a low setting, making maintenance a breeze.

Upon arrival, the pillows come vacuum-packed for convenience. It is recommended to wait for 24 hours before use to allow the pillows to expand to their full size.

Care Instructions:
- Machine wash at 30°C (86°F)
- Tumble dry on low setting

Experience the ultimate comfort and support with the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows. Order yours today!
